replies.body:
༼ つ ◕◕ ༽つ C9 take my energy༼ つ ◕◕ ༽つ
You guys are the best, Keep it up!

༼ つ ◕◕ ༽つ C9 take my energy༼ つ ◕◕ ༽つ
Let's keep riding that Cloud 9 Hai high. I hope we get SKT as our #1 seed to set the stage early. C9 thrives under the pressure.

From relegations zone to the Worlds, with a victory in the last game of the split versus TSM, followed by a victorious tie-breaker, then an epic gauntlet with two reverse sweeps.
NA LCS and more likely the e-sport in general will remember this epic run.

The best moment of qualifiers for me was when Sneaky went in for a kill, took a lot of damage and LemonNation flashed across the map and put up a shield at the perfect moment to keep Sneaky alive and C9 prime for the reverse sweep. Which of course we got :D #C9WIN all hail cloud nine
"Flashed across the map." What?

Lemonnation's beard is 10/10. 

but his hairline said gg
C9 go sneaky and incarnation carry {{champion:29}} {{champion:61}}
C9's fall and rise in one season. Wowowowowowowow...GL to C9
rip meteos   {{champion:32}} {{item:3070}}  BUT I STILL BELIEVE IN CLOUD 9
C9 scared the crap out of me for most of the split and then even more so in the double reverse sweep.  Keep it up C9 and best of luck in worlds.
That gauntlet, though. My wife had the defibrillator ready because I thought I was going to die lol. Them reverse sweeps had me sweating Balls.

#hailhai 
keep it going guys. You guys are the best team.
{{summoner:6}}

"Reaching Hai"
*groan* I had to double-check the top of the article to make sure it wasn't actually Phreak who wrote this :P

༼ つ ◕◕ ༽つ C9 take my energy༼ つ ◕◕ ༽つ I
I have Faith. You can do it!!!!
༼ つ ◕◕ ༽つ C9 Take my energy, the Cloud9 Dream Machine is still spinning!༼ つ ◕◕ ༽つ

༼ つ ◕◕ ༽つ C9 take my energy༼ つ ◕◕ ༽つ
never lost faith
Really glad they included ties in the record for the summer finish box
6/12 , still goes 1st place.. keep it up C9. RIP Meteos.
༼ つ ◕◕ ༽つ C9 take my energy༼ つ ◕◕ ༽つ

C9's in a weird group that features teams who all had amazing starts and finishes. That being said, if anyone is going to beat Fnatic (when it counts) C9 is probably going to be it. We all know they're gonna lose at some point, to have it be to NA's 7th place team who were almost put in relegation at the end of the season would be a pretty good way to shut up all those limey euros. {{champion:43}}

Hai, DO YOUR WORLD DOMINATION PLAN =) i mean COMPLIT IT! WITH {{champion:112}}  {{item:3198}}
C9 MY fav team after CLG . I Hope u make happy all the fans that reverse sweep amazed me !!! Best of luck at worlds if u can reach finals CLG will be there just to know :D
